Hassan Elahi vs. Netochka Nezvanova

December 2009

Hasan Elahi had to provide full online transparency of his every action and whereabouts to be let live the offline life he desired.

Netochka fooled everybody about her offline identity so she could live any online life she wanted without consequences.

This story is about privacy. With focus on identity, transparency.
A Way Of Creating And Enjoying Knowledge
The Digital Society
